name: Pain is a Lie
description: In this game you play as Sky, a woman who lost her loved one and is forced to move. Packing her belongings she reexperience all her memories, that now are painfull, with the one she lost.  The pain is loud and clear in her heart but the more she has to remember the more the pain gets easier to bear, and more happy tought arise from those old memories. We have to face our pain head on, not running away from it so that we can realise that Pain is a Lie
